title: About Time
description: When Tim Lake (Domhnall Gleeson) is 21, his father (Bill Nighy) tells him a secret: The men in their family can travel through time. Although he can't change history, Tim resolves to improve his life by getting a girlfriend. He meets Mary (Rachel McAdams), falls in love and finally wins her heart via time-travel and a little cunning. However, as his unusual life progresses, Tim finds that his special ability can't shield him and those he loves from the problems of everyday life.
summary: A man (Domhnall Gleeson) uses time-travel and cunning to win the woman of his dreams.

times.venue_name: UA Sheepshead Bay Stadium 14 IMAX & RPX
